strings:
<voice_0x010018A3><se_low>King Clavius: Last night, I had a long conversation with
King Trode.

<voice_0x010018A4><se_low>King Clavius: After much discussion, we have decided to
break off the engagement between you and
Princess Medea.

<voice_0x010018A5><se_def>Prince Charmles: Wh-What stuff and nonsense is this?
Father, if this is your idea of a joke,
I am not amused!
<voice_0x010018A6><se_low>King Clavius: You think I would joke about something like this? Dear Goddess, you really are a nitwit!
<voice_0x010018A7><se_low>King Clavius: You think I don't know what you did?
<voice_0x010018A8><se_low>King Clavius: Young fool! How did I ever think you were mature enough to marry? As your antics clearly demonstrate, you're still a child!

<voice_0x010018A9><se_low>King Clavius: Come along, we're going back to Argonia.
It's time I taught you some hard lessons about life, boy!
<voice_0x010018AA><se_high>Princess Medea: Um...
<voice_0x010018AB><se_high>Princess Medea: Father told me what happened.
<voice_0x010018AC><se_high>Princess Medea: I know you went to King Clavius and asked him to reconsider my union with Prince Charmles.
<voice_0x010018AD><se_high>Princess Medea: Thank you.

<voice_0x010018AE><se_high>Princess Medea: You've saved me yet again.
Like you always do.
<voice_0x010018AF><se_high>Princess Medea: You never let anything daunt you, do you? Just being near you makes me feel twice as strong... You're my rock. No, you're more than that...
<voice_0x010018B0><se_high>Princess Medea: But let us make this the last time.
<voice_0x010018B1><se_high>Princess Medea: I must take the strength you've given me and learn to forge my own path in life.
<voice_0x010018B2><se_high>Princess Medea: And...
<voice_0x010018B3><se_high>Princess Medea: And you must too. You have your own life to lead...and I want you to lead it.
<voice_0x010018B4><se_high>Princess Medea: I want you to devote yourself to the one in your heart, just as she will to you.

<voice_0x010018B5><se_low>King Clavius: Open the doors.
The bride is ready to enter!

<voice_0x010018B6><se_low>King Clavius: Honoured guests...with regret, I must inform
you that my son, Prince Charmles, and
Princess Medea of Trodain will not now
be joined in matrimony.

<voice_0x010018B7><se_low>King Clavius: I would like to offer my sincerest apologies
to all who have come here to celebrate
their nuptials.
<voice_0x010018B8><se_low>King Clavius: Nevertheless, we WILL bear witness to a joyful union this day... That of my young nephew here and his delightful bride!

<voice_0x010018B9><se_low>King Clavius: Let us all celebrate their marriage together,
and wish the young couple every happiness
for the future!
<voice_0x010018BA><se_high>Jessica: Ha ha, well?
<voice_0x010018BB><se_high>Jessica: It was a bit of a squeeze getting into this dress, but how do I look?
<voice_0x010018BC><se_high>Jessica: After you got back to the inn last night, Princess Medea asked for me.
<voice_0x010018BD><se_high>Jessica: When I went to see her, she told me the wedding was off and asked if I wouldn't mind getting married instead.

<voice_0x010018BE><se_high>Jessica: I thought she was joking at first,
but then King Trode said the same thing <endash>
and King Clavius too!
<voice_0x010018BF><se_high>Jessica: I was just about to tell them that I'd rather die than marry Charmles when Medea explained what she meant...
<voice_0x010018C0><se_high>Jessica: And before I knew it, I was trying on this dress.

<voice_0x010018C1><se_high>Jessica: Then Mum turned up.
And Bangerz and Mash, too.
<voice_0x010018C2><se_high>Jessica: My head's still spinning, it all happened so fast!

<voice_0x010018C3><se_high>Jessica: But...
Well...
<voice_0x010018C4><se_high>Jessica: I love you.

<voice_0x010018C5><se_high>Jessica: I'm not sure since when, but I suddenly realised...
you're all I think about.
<voice_0x010018C6><se_high>Jessica: I wanted to tell you, but I was sure you only had eyes for Princess Medea. So I decided to keep my feelings to myself.
<voice_0x010018C7><se_high>Jessica: That is, until she told me that you were in love with someone else...
<voice_0x010018C8><se_high>Jessica: When I heard that, I couldn't help hoping.

<voice_0x010018C9><se_high>Jessica: And that's when I decided <endash>
I don't want to go on pretending.

<voice_0x010018CA><se_high>Jessica: Burying my feelings isn't going to change
what my heart is telling me. I think...
I think you're the one.
<voice_0x010018CB>Jessica: .........
<voice_0x010018CC><se_high>Jessica: But what about you? Am I really the person you want to be with for the rest of your life?
<voice_0x010018CD><se_high>Jessica: If not, I-I'll understand, just...just tell me, okay?

<voice_0x010018CE><se_high>Jessica: I want to hear it from you.
I want to know how you really feel.
<voice_0x010018CF><se_high>Jessica: My hero!
<voice_0x010018D0><se_high>Rosalind: Jessica...
<voice_0x010018D1><se_high>Rosalind: I won't say another word about your choices in life. My only wish is for you and your new husband to be happy.
<voice_0x010018D2><se_high>Jessica: Mum, that... That really means a lot to me.

<voice_0x010018D3><se_high>Rosalind: She's a wilful one, but you know that already,
I suppose. Take care of her.

<voice_0x010018D4><se_high>Bangerz: Wooow! Congratulations, Jessica!
It's gonna be boring back home without you,
but you'll still come and visit us, right?
<voice_0x010018D5><se_high>Jessica: Actually, I was thinking of staying for a while.
<voice_0x010018D6><se_high>Jessica: We've barely stopped since I left to avenge Alistair's death. I could do with a rest.
<voice_0x010018D7><se_high>Bangerz: Really? Wahoo!
<voice_0x010018D8><se_high>Bangerz: Oh, and you... I mean, um, Mr. Jessica...
<voice_0x010018D9><se_high>Bangerz: I'll let you off this time, but if you ever make Jessica cry again, me and Mash will really let you have it!

<voice_0x010018DA><se_high>Jessica: Come on, then.
Everyone's waiting outside.
